django.contrib.sessions.backends.db
===================================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.sessions.backends.db


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.sessions.backends.db.SessionStore


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: SessionStore(session_key=None)

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.contrib.sessions.backends.base.SessionBase`


   Implement database session store.


   .. py:method:: get_model_class()
      :classmethod:



   .. py:method:: model()


   .. py:method:: load()


   .. py:method:: exists(session_key)


   .. py:method:: create()


   .. py:method:: create_model_instance(data)

      Return a new instance of the session model object, which represents the
      current session state. Intended to be used for saving the session data
      to the database.



   .. py:method:: save(must_create=False)

      Save the current session data to the database. If 'must_create' is
      True, raise a database error if the saving operation doesn't create a
      new entry (as opposed to possibly updating an existing entry).



   .. py:method:: delete(session_key=None)


   .. py:method:: clear_expired()
      :classmethod:
